name: Chased by Zombies
description:
This is my submission for Wowie game jam 2022 ! 
I am a noob game dev and I made this prototype in few hours, using some free and paid assets, the help of my game dev teacher and some YT tutorials of course. 

The them of the Jam is " Collaborate with AI " .
Basically the AI is a blue car that needs to escape a city full of zombies who follow it. Your goal is to protect the blue car by driving on the zombies and shooting at them. You can also pick health pack that will give health back to the blue car. Sometimes you might need to push it a bit as well as the AI is not very smart ;).

Hope you will enjoy it ! a run is around 2-4 minutes long.
